content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the processes occurring between the mouse populations and their environments?

choices.label: Natural selection favors the mice with the dark coat color, causing the mice in all of the populations to be better adapted.
Natural selection favors the mice with the light coat color, causing the mice in all of the populations to be better adapted.
Dark color is selected for in mice from the West, Mid, and East populations.
Light color is selected for in mice from the West, Mid, and East populations.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
